androidx.core.content.res

Class TypedArrayUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.core.content.res.TypedArrayUtils

  • public class TypedArrayUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Compat methods for accessing TypedArray values. All the getNamed*() functions added the attribute name match, to take care of potential ID collision between the private attributes in older OS version (OEM) and the attributes existed in the newer OS version. For example, if an private attribute named "abcdefg" in Kitkat has the same id value as "android:pathData" in Lollipop, we need to match the attribute's namefirst.

        @Nullable
public static TypedValue peekNamedValue(@NonNull

                                                  @NonNull
                                                  java.lang.String attrName,
